text: Saint David is an administrative parish of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, on the island of Saint Vincent. Its capital is Chateaubelair. * Area: 80 km² (31 mi²) * Population: 6,700 (2000 estimates) ==Populated places== The following populated places are located within the parish of Saint David: * Chateaubelair () * Richmond () * Richmond Vale () * Rosehall (Rose Hall, ) * Troumaka () * Wallibou () ==References== ==External links== * Parishes of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, Statoids.com Category:Parishes of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
title: Saint David Parish, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
